sentence.Network_en: He had clung to the remembrance of things past.
They wore black in remembrance of those who had died.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们身穿黑色衣服，以纪念那些亡故者。

sentence.Network_en: A service was held in remembrance of local soldiers killed in the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 为当地阵亡的战士举行了纪念仪式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from remembrer (see remember)

entry.def: If you do something in remembrance of a dead person, you do it as a way of showing that you want to remember them and that you respect them.

example.ex: They wore black in remembrance of those who had died.
example.tran: 他们身穿黑色衣服，以纪念那些亡故者。

entry.def: A remembrance is a memory that you have of someone or something.

example.ex: He had clung to the remembrance of things past.

example.tran: 关于家庭假日的更愉快的记忆

means.word_mean: 1. the ability to recall past occurrences

auth_sentence.content: The remembrance of poor Susy's...hay-ride...brings me a pang.
auth_sentence.res_content: The remembrance of poor Susy's...hay-ride...brings me a pang.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The remembrance of poor Susy's...hay-ride...brings me a pang.

auth_sentence.content: Recollection requires some mental exertion; remembrance is the act of remembering.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recollection requires some mental exertion; remembrance is the act of remembering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Recollection requires some mental exertion; remembrance is the act of remembering.

auth_sentence.content: Sixty, when raw bereavement is turned to second or third-generation remembrance?
auth_sentence.res_content: Sixty, when raw bereavement is turned to second or third-generation remembrance?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sixty, when raw bereavement is turned to second or third-generation remembrance?

stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+memor记忆+able……的→大家该一起记住→值得纪念的
im不+memor记忆+ial……的→不能记得的→远古的
memor记忆+andum东西→帮助记的东西→备忘录

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
stems_affixes.word_buile: memor记忆+y状态,性质→n.记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
re再+membr=memor记忆+ance表名词→n.记得,记忆
com共同+memor记住+ate表动词→大家一起记住→纪念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记住;[to]转达问候,代……致意,代……问好
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+member=memor记忆→再记得→回忆,记忆

sentences.en: On Remembrance Sunday we honour those who died.
sentences.cn: 我们在休战纪念星期日这天向捐躯的人致敬。

sentences.en: This watch is a remembrance of my father.
sentences.cn: 这块手表是我父亲留下的纪念品。

means.word_mean: 记忆, 回忆, 纪念

sentences.en: All remembrance of him has escaped from my mind.
Do you have any remembrance of your childhood?
